mean_en: a word formed from the first letters of the words that make up the name of something, for example ‘AIDS’ is an acronym for ‘acquired immune deficiency syndrome’
sentence: R.A.D.A.R. is an acronym that can be remembered by being pronounced as a word.
sentence_trans: 雷达是一个首字母缩略词，可以当一整个词来读以方便记忆。
word_etyma: acr尖端 ＋ onym名字 → acronym首字母缩略词
